about_the_game:
Final Boss is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This game will immerse you headlong into the story of a guy who meets a nice girl at a party. This girl turned out to be a sexy girl who loves sex very much.

In this wonderful game you have to plunge into the story of a guy who met a new girl at a party. She loves to play video games just like he does. This couple very quickly develops a romance that develops into hot sex. What happened next you will see in the game. Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music.

Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
